title: Problems with custom maps
body: I was wondering if there is any way to disable the LCS Worlds map because it causes issues with custom map skins. I'm trying to use a halloween skin for my YouTube channel so I'd really rather not wait until Worlds is over. Thanks!

replies.body: We don't support third party programs, so aside from suggesting removal of the skin there isn't much assistance I could offer.  Mods and programs like this can often cause issues and crashes, and I'd recommend not using it in case it causes you to crash and leave your teammates behind.  Good luck!
